title: Saudi Arabia could sell more of its crown jewel. China is the most likely buyer
content:
1. Saudi Arabia could sell more of its crown jewel. China is the most likely buyer  CNN

localize.title: サウジは、自国の宝をもっと売ることができる。中国が最も有力な買い手
